title: MC启动出错（BitIndex<0:-1)?
author: refsil
txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 挖槽 楼主你装MOD装疯了吗

replies.author: refsil
replies.txt_content: 咱还有一大堆MOD等着装呢……这问题纠结死我了
